lms_rozier_convers.core.penalty

Class PenaltyCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • lms_rozier_convers.core.penalty.PenaltyCalculator

  • public abstract class PenaltyCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    The strenght of the Penalty calculator is that he just needs an instance member. Thus, the addition of new member types is invisible for it. 16/11/2015.

      • penalise

        public static void penalise(Member member,
                            LibraryItem borrowedItem)
        Checks for a member and an item if the member is late for the return of the item. If this is the case, it adds a penalty to the list of penalties of the member.
